text: Tuning of transmit and receive carriers in increments of 1 kHz over the full 500-MHz uplink and downlink satellite frequency bands is provided. An automatic carrier balance capability provides automatic leveling of each transmitted carrier with an accuracy of *0.2 dB. The AN/MSC-60 terminal has been designed with extensive and sophis­ ticated automatic fault location, monitors and alarms. An interface has been provided for remoting the analog and digital signals relating to the many parameters that are monitored. 17-19 Figure 17-5.
